org.mozilla.jrex.event.window
Interface WindowListener

public interface WindowListener

The JRex WindowListener interface, This listener can be added to listen to any window creation and disposing action taken by JRex window manager.

Version:
1.0
Author:
C.N.Medappa

Method Summary
 void windowCreated(int jrexPeerID)
          Invoked after a browser component is created.
 void windowDisposing(int jrexPeerID)
          Invoked just before browser component is disposed.
